thread.title: Jamie O'Hara and Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney's romance hots up in Dubai despite claims family want her to ditch him
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara and Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney's romance hots up in Dubai despite claims family want her to ditch him

author: Janine Yaqoob
title: Jamie O'Hara and Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney's romance hots up in Dubai despite claims family want her to ditch him
text:
Jamie O'Hara and Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney in Dubai (Photo: Splash News) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Soccer's Jamie O’Hara and girlfriend Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney show their relationship has gone into extra time as they spend time together in Dubai. 
But the pictures may unsettle members of her family who have reportedly urged her to give the ex-Tottenham star the boot. 
Jamie, 30 – who has three kids with ex-wife Danielle Lloyd , 33 – got back with Elizabeth-Jayne recently after leaving the Celebrity Big Brother House. On CBB he had romanced Bianca Gascoigne , 30, stepdaughter of ex-soccer star Paul. 
Jamie and Elizabeth-Jayne, 25, looked a little perplexed as they stopped in the street – but then shared a kiss, with Jamie sporting a hat with the words “Coups de-tat”. Read More Elizabeth-Jayne's family reportedly think she can do better (Photo: Splash News) O'Hara kisses Elizabeth-Jayne on a break in the emirate (Photo: Splash News) Elizabeth-Jayne is a successful lingerie model, while O'Hara is without a club after leaving Gillingham (Photo: Splash News) 
Getting back with the lingerie model may be a coup indeed for Jamie, who previously gushed on Instagram: “The absolute love of my life, gives me the strength to get through anything and don’t appreciate her enough sometimes.” 
But her family are said not to approve. A close source claimed: “They think Jamie is no good. Read More O'Hara was romancing Bianca Gascoigne recently on CBB (Photo: Splash News) O'Hara has three kids with his ex-wife Danielle Lloyd (Photo: Splash News) The couple just missed Bianca, who has flown out to the UAE (Photo: Splash News) 
"She’s a beautiful, succesful model and she can do better. They have told her this but she won’t have any of it.” 
Jamie – out of soccer through injury – was at London Fashion Week with Elizabeth-Jayne after the Dubai jaunt. They only just missed Bianca, who has flown to the emirate on hols. Read More O'Hara and Elizabeth-Jayne in loved-up snap (Photo: Instagram) Like us on Facebook
